Efendi Nahi.verse 51:4: dhe pasha engjëjt që shpërndajnë urdhërat, -
Efendi Nahi.verse 51:5: me të vërtetë, është e sigurt ajo që ju premtohet,
Efendi Nahi.verse 51:6: dhe çdo shpërblim (i premtuar) do të ndodhë!
Efendi Nahi.verse 51:7: Pasha qiellin e stolisur me yje,
Efendi Nahi.verse 51:8: ju jeni të larmishëm në fjalë,
Efendi Nahi.verse 51:9: prej tij (Pejgamberit ose Kur’anit) është shmangur ai që ka qenë i shmangur (edhe më parë).
Efendi Nahi.verse 51:11: Ata që janë thelluar në injorancë (dhe harrojnë ringjalljen).
Efendi Nahi.verse 51:12: Ata pyesin: “Kur do të jetë Dita e shpërblimit?”
Efendi Nahi.verse 51:13: (Do të jetë) atë Ditë kur ata do të përcëllohen në zjarr!
Efendi Nahi.verse 51:14: (U thuhet atyre): “Shijoni dënimin tuaj! Ky (dënim) është ai që e nxitojshit!”
Efendi Nahi.verse 51:15: Ata që i druajnë Perëndisë, me të vërtetë, do të jenë në kopshte dhe burime,
Efendi Nahi.verse 51:16: duke marrë atë që ua ka dhuruar Zoti i tyre, meqë ata, me të vërtetë, më parë kanë qenë bamirës,
Efendi Nahi.verse 51:17: ata, kanë fjetur pak natën (duke iu lutur Perëndisë)
Efendi Nahi.verse 51:18: po dhe në agim kërkonin falje,
Efendi Nahi.verse 51:19: e, në pasuritë e tyre ka pasur pjesë për lypësit dhe nevojtarët.
Efendi Nahi.verse 51:20: Në Tokë ka argumente (të shumta) për ata që besojnë qëndrueshëm,
Efendi Nahi.verse 51:21: po edhe në ju – a nuk shihni vallë?
Efendi Nahi.verse 51:22: E në qiell është furnizimi dhe premtimi juaj.
Efendi Nahi.verse 51:23: Dhe, Pasha Zotin e qiellit dhe të Tokës, kjo është vërtetë e saktë, ashtu si është e vërtetë (aftësia e) të folurit tuaj.
Efendi Nahi.verse 51:24: A të ka arritur ty lajmi për mysafirët e ndershëm të Ibrahimit?
Efendi Nahi.verse 51:25: Kur ata hynë tek ai, e i thanë: “Selam (Paqë! – shpëtimi u qoftë!)” dhe ai u tha: “Selam (Paqë! Qofshi të shpëtuar!)” Ju jeni – (tha në vetvete) popull i panjohur!”
Efendi Nahi.verse 51:26: Dhe, pa u hetuar, ai shkoi te njerëzit e shtëpisë dhe solli viç të majmë (të pjekur),
Efendi Nahi.verse 51:27: e ua afroi atyre, e u tha: “A s’po hani?”
Efendi Nahi.verse 51:28: Dhe, ndjeu frikë prej tyre, (e) ata i thanë: “Mos u friko!” dhe e sihariquan atë (se do t’i lindë) një djalë i dijshëm.
Efendi Nahi.verse 51:29: Dhe, u duk gruaja e tij, duke thërritur dhe duke e rrahur fytyrën, e tha: “Vallë, unë plaka, sterile (a mund) të lind?!
Efendi Nahi.verse 51:30: Ata thanë: “Kështu ka thënë Zoti yt.
Efendi Nahi.verse 51:31: (Ibrahimi u tha atyre): “Cfarë është obligimi juaj, o pejgamberë?”
Efendi Nahi.verse 51:32: Ata thanë: “Na jemi dërguar te një popull mëkatar,
Efendi Nahi.verse 51:33: për të hudhur gurë mbi ta prej (baltës) së forcuar,
Efendi Nahi.verse 51:34: të shënuar te Zoti yt për ata që e kalojnë kufirin (në të këqia)
Efendi Nahi.verse 51:35: Dhe, Ne i nxorëm ata besimtarë që ishin aty (në atë vendbanim) –
Efendi Nahi.verse 51:36: e në të kemi gjetur vetëm një shtëpi muslimane –
Efendi Nahi.verse 51:37: dhe, në të – kemi lënë argument (shenjë) për ata që i druajnë dënimit të dhembshëm.
Efendi Nahi.verse 51:38: Dhe, ne kemi sjellë këshillë edhe te Musai kur ia dërguam atë – Faraonit, me argument të qartë,
Efendi Nahi.verse 51:39: e u shmang (Faraoni), duke u mbështetur në pushtetin e vet, dhe tha: “(Ai është) magjistar ose i çmendur!”
Efendi Nahi.verse 51:40: Dhe, ne e kapëm atë dhe ushtrinë e tij dhe e hodhëm në det; ai është i qortuar (mëkatar).
Efendi Nahi.verse 51:41: (Dhe, Ne, kemi dhënë këshillë mbi ngjarjen) e Adit, kur e dërguam frymën shkatërruese mbi ta,
Efendi Nahi.verse 51:42: e cila nuk kurseu asgjë ngado që kaloi, e që të mos e ketë bërë si kalbësirë.
Efendi Nahi.verse 51:43: Edhe për Themudin, kur iu tha atyre: “Kënaquni një kohë!”
Efendi Nahi.verse 51:44: E, u madhështuan ndaj urdhërave të Perëndisë, e pastaj i goditi rrufeja (zëri i tmerrshëm), e ata e shikonin atë (dënimin),
Efendi Nahi.verse 51:45: dhe nuk mundën as të ngritën, as të mbrohen prej dënimit.
Efendi Nahi.verse 51:46: Edhe për popullin e Nuhut, që më parë (i kemi shkatërruar).
Efendi Nahi.verse 51:47: Ne, e kemi ndërtuar qiellin me pushtetin Tonë, e Ne, me të vërtetë, jemi të pushtetshëm edhe më tepër,
Efendi Nahi.verse 51:48: dhe Tokën e kemi shtruar – sa i mrekullueshëm është Ai që e ka shtruar! –
Efendi Nahi.verse 51:49: dhe, prej çdo gjëje kemi krijuar çifte, që të meditoni ju!
Efendi Nahi.verse 51:50: Andaj, mbështetuni te Perëndia, se unë, me të vërtetë, jam dërguar te ju – prej Tij, paralajmërues i qartë;
Efendi Nahi.verse 51:51: Dhe, mos i përshkruani Perëndisë zot tjetër, se unë, me të vërtetë, jam dërguar te ju – prej Tij, paralajmërues i qartë!”
Efendi Nahi.verse 51:52: Po ashtu, nuk ka ardhur as para tyre asnjë pejgamber, e që të mos thonin (për te): “Eshtë magjistar”, apo: “Eshtë i çmendur!”
Efendi Nahi.verse 51:53: Vallë, a mos ia kanë rekomanduar këtë njëri-tjetrit? Jo, por ata janë popull rebel,
Efendi Nahi.verse 51:54: e, shmangu prej tyre; ti nuk do të qortohesh për këtë,
Efendi Nahi.verse 51:55: dhe (vazhdoje) këshillimin, se, me të vërtetë, këshilla u bën dobi besimtarëve.
Efendi Nahi.verse 51:56: Xhindët dhe njerëzit i kam krijuar vetëm që të Më adhurojnë,
Efendi Nahi.verse 51:57: Unë nuk kërkoj prej tyre furnizim, as nuk dëshiroj që të Më ushqejnë,
Efendi Nahi.verse 51:58: furnizimin e jep vetëm Perëndia, i Fuqishmi, i Paluhatshmi!
Efendi Nahi.verse 51:59: Me të vërtetë, për ata që kanë bërë zullum, kanë pjesë (të dënimit), të ngjashëm pjesës së shokëve të tyre që kanë qenë si ata, e le të mos e nxitojnë atë (dënimin),
Efendi Nahi.verse 51:60: sepse, mjerë për mohuesit prej Ditës që u është premtuar! (dënimin),

null.verse 51:1: (Toz-torpağı) sovurub-dağıdan küləklərə;
null.verse 51:4: Və ruzi bölən (hərəsi bir işə müvəkkil olan) mələklərə and olsun ki,
null.verse 51:5: Sizə və'd olunan (qiyamət) həqiqətdir (mütləq vaqe olacaqdır).
null.verse 51:6: Haqq-hesab (əmələ görə cəza və mükafat) da labüddür!
null.verse 51:7: (Cürbəcür ulduz) yolları olan göyə and olsun ki,
null.verse 51:8: (Ey müşriklər!) Sizin (Qur'an və Muhəmməd əleyhissəlam barəsində) sözləriniz müxtəlifdir (bə'ziniz Qur'ana şe'r, Peyğəmbərə şair, bə'ziniz də Qur'ana kahinlik əsəri, Peyğəmbərə kahin deyirsiniz).
null.verse 51:9: Ondan (Qur'andan, yaxud Muhəmməd əleyhissəlamdan) zatında dönüklük olan kimsə dönər! (Allahın əzəli elmində imandan kim dönmüşdürsə, Qur'andan və Peyğəmbərdən də elə o dönər!)
null.verse 51:10: Məhv olsun yalançılar! (Allah onlara lə'nət eləsin!)
null.verse 51:11: O kəslər ki, cəhalət girdabına düşüb (haqdan) qafil olmuşlar!
null.verse 51:12: Onlar (səndən istehza ilə) haqq-hesab gününün nə vaxt olacağını soruşarlar.
null.verse 51:13: O gün onlara cəhənnəm odunda əzab veriləcəkdir.
null.verse 51:14: (Mələklər onlara deyəcəklər: ) "Dadın əzabınızı! Bu sizin (dünyada) tez-tələsik gəlməsini istədiyiniz şeydir (əzabdır)!"
null.verse 51:15: Həqiqətən, müttəqilər cənnətlərdə və çeşmələr başında olacaqlar;
null.verse 51:16: Rəbbinin onlara verdiyini alacaqlar.
null.verse 51:17: Onlar gecələr (ibadətlə məşğul olub) az yatırdılar.
null.verse 51:18: Səhərlər isə (Allahdan) bağışlanmalarını diləyirdilər.
null.verse 51:19: Mallarında da dilənçinin və (abrına qısılıb dilənməyən) yoxsulun haqqı (payı) var idi.
null.verse 51:20: Yerdə (Allaha) tam yəqinliklə inananlar üçün (Onun əzəmət və qüdrətinə, vəhdaniyyətinə dəlalət edən) əlamətlər vardır.
null.verse 51:21: Sizin özünüz də (sizi yaradanın birliyini sübut edən) əlamətlər vardır.
null.verse 51:22: Göydə də ruzinin (yağış, qar) və və'd olunduğunuz şey (mükafat, cəza) vardır! (Sizə və'd olunan mükafat, yaxud cəza Allah dərgahındakı lövhi-məhfuzda yazılmışdır).
null.verse 51:23: Göyün və yerin Rəbbinə (sahibinə) and olsun ki, bu (deyilənlər) sizin danışığınız (dediyiniz sözün öz sözünüz olması) kimi həqiqətdir.
null.verse 51:24: (Ya Rəsulum!) İbrahimin möhtərəm qonaqlarının (mələklərin) söhbəti sənə gəlib çatdımı?
null.verse 51:25: Onlar (İbrahimin) yanına gəlib salam verdikdə (İbrahim) salamı alıb (öz-özünə): "Bunlar tanımadığım kimsələrdir!" -dedi.
null.verse 51:26: O (bir bəhanə ilə) ailəsinin yanına getdi və bir buzov (kəsib qızardaraq) gətirdi.
null.verse 51:27: Onu qabaqlarına (qonaqların qabağına) qoyub: "Bəlkə, yeyəsiniz!" - dedi.
null.verse 51:28: (İbrahim qonaqların yeməyə əl uzatmadıqlarını gördükdə) onlardan qorxuya düşdü.
null.verse 51:29: (Bunu eşidən) zövcəsi (Sara) çağır-bağır salıb (təəccübündən əlini) üzünə çırparaq dedi: "Mən qoca, qısır bir qarıyam! (Mənim necə uşağım ola bilər?)"
null.verse 51:30: Onlar: "Sənin Rəbbin belə buyurmuşdur.
null.verse 51:31: (Sonra İbrahim) dedi: "Ey elçilər! Sizin işiniz nədir?"
null.verse 51:32: Onlar dedilər: "Biz günahkar bir qövmə (Lut tayfasına cəza verməyə) göndərilmişik.
null.verse 51:33: Onların başına gildən daşlar yağdırmaq üçün (gəlmişik).
null.verse 51:34: (Elə daşlar ki, onlara pozğunluqla məşğul olub) həddi aşanlar üçün sənin Rəbbinin dərgahında xüsusi nişan qoyulmuşdur!"
null.verse 51:35: Nəhayət, (Lut qövmünü məhv etmək üçün) orada (Sədumda) olan mö'minləri çıxartdıq.
null.verse 51:36: Lakin orada bir evdən (Lutun ailəsindən) başqa müsəlman (tövhid dinində olan) tapmadıq.
null.verse 51:37: Və orada (axirətdəki) şiddətli əzabdan qorxanlar üçün bir nişanə qoyduq.
null.verse 51:38: Musanın hekayətində də (bir ibrət dərsi vardır).
null.verse 51:39: O, bütün ə'yanları (və qoşunu) ilə birlikdə (imandan) üz döndərib (Musa barəsində): "Bu sehrbazdır, yaxud da dəlidir!" - demişdi.
null.verse 51:40: Nəhayət, onu və əsgərlərini tutub dənizə atdıq.
null.verse 51:41: Adın (Ad qövmünün) başına gələnlərdə də (bir ibrət dərsi vardır).
null.verse 51:42: O, qarşısına çıxan heç bir şeyi buraxmır, onu sovurub külə (çör-çöpə) döndərirdi.
null.verse 51:43: Səmudun (Səmud qövmünün) başına gələnlərdə də (bir ibrət dərsi vardır).
null.verse 51:44: Onlar öz Rəbbinin əmrinə (tabe olmağa) təkəbbür göstərmiş və onları gözləri baxa-baxa ildırım vurmuşdu.
null.verse 51:45: Onların nə (yıxıldıqları yerdən) qalxmağa gücləri çatmış, nə də (bir kimsədən özlərinə) kömək istəyə bilmişdilər (yaxud nə də özlərinə cəza verəndən intiqam ala bilmişdilər).
null.verse 51:46: Daha əvvəl Nuh qövmünü (məhv etmişdik).
null.verse 51:47: Biz göyü qüdrətimizlə (qüdrət əlimizlə) yaratdıq və Biz (istədiyimiz hər şeyi yaratmağa) qadirik.
null.verse 51:48: Yeri də Biz döşədik.
null.verse 51:49: Biz hər şeydən (erkək və dişi, bir-birinin əksi olmaqla) cüt-cüt yaratdıq.
null.verse 51:50: (Ya Rəsulum! Bu insanlara de: ) "Allaha tərəf qaçın! (Allahın qəzəbindən qaçıb Onun mərhəmətinə sığının, küfrü atıb imana gəlin!) Mən sizi Ondan (Allahın əzabından) açıq-aşkar qorxudan bir peyğəmbərəm!
null.verse 51:51: Allahla yanaşı başqa bir tanrı qəbul etməyin.
null.verse 51:52: (Ya Rəsulum! Sənin qövmün sənə şair, sehrbaz, divanə dediyi kimi) eləcə də onlardan əvvəlkilər özlərinə bir peyğəmbər gələr-gəlməz ona sehrbaz, divanə dedilər.
null.verse 51:53: Görəsən, onlar bunu (bu dediklərini) bir-birinə vəsiyyətmi etmişlər?! (Hamısı eyni şeyi deyir).
null.verse 51:54: (Ya Rəsulum!) Artıq onlardan üz döndər! Sən buna görə qınanası deyilsən (çünki sənə həvalə olunmuş risaləti layiqincə təbliğ etdin).
null.verse 51:55: Sən (onlara Qur'anla) öyüd-nəsihət ver.
null.verse 51:56: Mən cinləri və insanları yalnız Mənə ibadət etmək üçün yaratdım!
null.verse 51:57: Mən onlardan ruzi istəmirəm.
null.verse 51:58: Şübhəsiz ki, ruzi verən də, qüvvət sahibi də, yenilməz olan da Allahdır!
null.verse 51:59: Həqiqət, zülm edənlərin (özlərindən əvvəlki) yoldaşlarının qisməti kimi bir qisməti vardır! (Allaha şərik qoşmaqla özlərinə zülm edən Məkkə müşriklərini də əvvəlki ümmətlər kimi şiddətli bir əzab gözləyir!) Qoy onlar Məni (özlərinə əzab verməyə) tələsdirməsinlər!
null.verse 51:60: Və'd olunduqları gündən (qiyamət günündən) dolayı vay kafirlərin halına!

null.verse 51:1: Tako Mi onih koji pušu snažno,
null.verse 51:5: istina je, zaista, ono čime vam se prijeti,
null.verse 51:6: nagrada i kazna sigurno će biti!
null.verse 51:7: Tako Mi neba punog zvjezdanih puteva,
null.verse 51:8: vi govorite nejednako,
null.verse 51:9: od njega se odvraća onaj za kog se znalo da će se odvratiti.
null.verse 51:11: koji su, utonuli u neznanje, ravnodušni!
null.verse 51:12: Oni pitaju: "Kada će Dan sudnji?"
null.verse 51:13: Onoga Dana kada se u vatri budu pržili!
null.verse 51:14: Iskusite kaznu svoju - to je ono što ste požurivali!
null.verse 51:15: Oni koji su se Allaha bojali - u džennetskim baščama će, među izvorima, boraviti,
null.verse 51:16: primaće ono što im Gospodar njihov bude darovao, jer, oni su prije toga dobra djela činili,
null.verse 51:17: noću su malo spavali
null.verse 51:18: i u praskazorje oprost od grijeha molili,
null.verse 51:19: a u imecima njihovim bio je udio i za onoga koji prosi i za onoga koji ne prosi.
null.verse 51:20: Na Zemlji su dokazi za one koji čvrsto vjeruju,
null.verse 51:21: a i u vama samima - zar ne vidite? -
null.verse 51:22: a na nebu je opskrba vaša i ono što vam se obećava.
null.verse 51:23: I, tako Mi Gospodara neba i Zemlje, to je istina, kao što je istina da govorite!
null.verse 51:24: Da li je doprla do tebe vijest o uvaženim gostima Ibrahimovim
null.verse 51:25: kada mu oni uđoše i rekoše: "Mir vama!", i on reče: "Mir vama, ljudi neznani!"
null.verse 51:26: I on neprimijetno ode ukućanima svojim i donese debelo tele,
null.verse 51:27: i primače im ga: "Zar nećete da jedete?" - upita,
null.verse 51:28: osjetivši od njih u duši zebnju.
null.verse 51:29: I pojavi se se žena njegova uzvikujući i po licu se udarajući, i reče: "Zar ja, stara, nerotkinja?!"
null.verse 51:30: Tako je odredio Gospodar tvoj - rekoše oni -
null.verse 51:31: A šta vi hoćete, o izaslanici? - upita Ibrahim.
null.verse 51:32: Poslani smo narodu grješnom - rekoše -
null.verse 51:33: da sručimo na njih grumenje od ilovače,
null.verse 51:34: svako obilježeno u Gospodara tvoga za one koji su u razvratu svaku mjeru prešli.
null.verse 51:35: I Mi iz njega vjernike izvedosmo -
null.verse 51:36: a u njemu samo jednu kuću muslimansku nađosmo -
null.verse 51:37: i u njemu za sve one koji se boje patnje neizdržive znak ostavismo.
null.verse 51:38: I o Musau, kada ga s očiglednim dokazom faraonu poslasmo,
null.verse 51:39: a on, uzdajući se u moć svoju, okrenu glavu i reče: "Čarobnjak je ili lud!"
null.verse 51:40: I Mi i njega i vojske njegove dohvatismo, pa ih u more bacismo, jer je bio osudu zaslužio.
null.verse 51:41: I o Adu, kada na njih vjetar poslasmo u kome nije bilo nikakva dobra -
null.verse 51:42: pored čega god je prošao, ništa nije poštedio, sve je u gnjilež pretvorio.
null.verse 51:43: I o Semudu, kad mu bi rečeno: "Uživajte još izvjesno vrijeme!"
null.verse 51:44: I oni se oglušiše o naređenje Gospodara svoga, pa ih uništi strašan glas na oči njihove,
null.verse 51:45: i ne mogaše se ni dići ni od kazne odbraniti.
null.verse 51:46: I o Nuhovu narodu, davno prije; to, zaista, bijaše narod neposlušni!
null.verse 51:47: Mi smo nebo moći Svojoj sazdali, a Mi, uistinu, još neizmjerno mnogo možemo,
null.verse 51:48: i Zemlju smo prostrli - tako je divan Onaj koji je prostro! -
null.verse 51:49: i od svega po par stvaramo da biste vi razmislili!
null.verse 51:50: Zato požurite Allahu, ja sam vam od Njega da vas javno upozorim;
null.verse 51:51: ne prihvatajte drugog boga osim Allaha, ja sam vam od Njega da vas jasno opomenem!"
null.verse 51:52: I tako je bilo, ni onima prije ovih nije došao nijedan poslanik, a da nisu rekli: "Čarobnjak je!", ili: "Lud je!"
null.verse 51:53: Zar su to jedni drugima u amanet ostavljali? Nisu, nego su oni ljudi koji su u zlu svaku mjeru bili prevršili,
null.verse 51:54: zato ove ostavi, prijekor nećeš zaslužiti,
null.verse 51:55: i nastavi savjetovati, savjet će vjernicima, doista, koristiti.
null.verse 51:56: Džine i ljude sam stvorio samo zato da Mi se klanjaju,
null.verse 51:57: Ja ne tražim od njih opskrbu niti želim da Me hrane,
null.verse 51:58: opskrbu daje jedino Allah, Moćni i Jaki!
null.verse 51:59: A nevjernike će stići kazna kao što je stigla i one koji su bili kao oni, i neka Me ne požuruju,
null.verse 51:60: jer, teško nevjernicima na Dan kojim im se prijeti! požuruju,

null.verse 51:1: কসম ঝঞ্ঝাবায়ুর।
null.verse 51:5: তোমাদের প্রদত্ত ওয়াদা অবশ্যই সত্য।
null.verse 51:6: ইনসাফ অবশ্যম্ভাবী।
null.verse 51:7: পথবিশিষ্ট আকাশের কসম,
null.verse 51:8: তোমরা তো বিরোধপূর্ণ কথা বলছ।
null.verse 51:9: যে ভ্রষ্ট, সেই এ থেকে মুখ ফিরায়,
null.verse 51:11: যারা উদাসীন, ভ্রান্ত।
null.verse 51:12: তারা জিজ্ঞাসা করে, কেয়ামত কবে হবে?
null.verse 51:13: যেদিন তারা অগ্নিতে পতিত হবে,
null.verse 51:14: তোমরা তোমাদের শাস্তি আস্বাদন কর। তোমরা একেই ত্বরান্বিত করতে চেয়েছিল।
null.verse 51:15: খোদাভীরুরা জান্নাতে ও প্রস্রবণে থাকবে।
null.verse 51:16: এমতাবস্থায় যে, তারা গ্রহণ করবে যা তাদের পালনকর্তা তাদেরকে দেবেন। নিশ্চয় ইতিপূর্বে তারা ছিল সৎকর্মপরায়ণ,
null.verse 51:17: তারা রাত্রির সামান্য অংশেই নিদ্রা যেত,
null.verse 51:18: রাতের শেষ প্রহরে তারা ক্ষমাপ্রার্থনা করত,
null.verse 51:19: এবং তাদের ধন-সম্পদে প্রার্থী ও বঞ্চিতের হক ছিল।
null.verse 51:20: বিশ্বাসকারীদের জন্যে পৃথিবীতে নিদর্শনাবলী রয়েছে,
null.verse 51:21: এবং তোমাদের নিজেদের মধ্যেও, তোমরা কি অনুধাবন করবে না?
null.verse 51:22: আকাশে রয়েছে তোমাদের রিযিক ও প্রতিশ্রুত সবকিছু।
null.verse 51:23: নভোমন্ডল ও ভূমন্ডলের পালনকর্তার কসম, তোমাদের কথাবার্তার মতই এটা সত্য।
null.verse 51:24: আপনার কাছে ইব্রাহীমের সম্মানিত মেহমানদের বৃত্তান্ত এসেছে কি?
null.verse 51:25: যখন তারা তাঁর কাছে উপস্থিত হয়ে বললঃ সালাম, তখন সে বললঃ সালাম। এরা তো অপরিচিত লোক।
null.verse 51:26: অতঃপর সে গ্রহে গেল এবং একটি ঘৃতেপক্ক মোটা গোবৎস নিয়ে হাযির হল।
null.verse 51:27: সে গোবৎসটি তাদের সামনে রেখে বললঃ তোমরা আহার করছ না কেন?
null.verse 51:28: অতঃপর তাদের সম্পর্কে সে মনে মনে ভীত হলঃ তারা বললঃ ভীত হবেন না। তারা তাঁকে একট জ্ঞানীগুণী পুত্র সন্তানের সুসংবাদ দিল।
null.verse 51:29: অতঃপর তাঁর স্ত্রী চীৎকার করতে করতে সামনে এল এবং মুখ চাপড়িয়ে বললঃ আমি তো বৃদ্ধা, বন্ধ্যা।
null.verse 51:30: তারা বললঃ তোমার পালনকর্তা এরূপই বলেছেন। নিশ্চয় তিনি প্রজ্ঞাময়, সর্বজ্ঞ।
null.verse 51:31: ইব্রাহীম বললঃ হে প্রেরিত ফেরেশতাগণ, তোমাদের উদ্দেশ্য কি?
null.verse 51:32: তারা বললঃ আমরা এক অপরাধী সম্প্রদায়ের প্রতি প্রেরিত হয়েছি,
null.verse 51:33: যাতে তাদের উপর মাটির ঢিলা নিক্ষেপ করি।
null.verse 51:34: যা সীমাতিক্রমকারীদের জন্যে আপনার পালনকর্তার কাছে চিহি?ত আছে।
null.verse 51:35: অতঃপর সেখানে যারা ঈমানদার ছিল, আমি তাদেরকে উদ্ধার করলাম।
null.verse 51:36: এবং সেখানে একটি গৃহ ব্যতীত কোন মুসলমান আমি পাইনি।
null.verse 51:37: যারা যন্ত্রণাদায়ক শাস্তিকে ভয় করে, আমি তাদের জন্যে সেখানে একটি নিদর্শন রেখেছি।
null.verse 51:38: এবং নিদর্শন রয়েছে মূসার বৃত্তান্তে; যখন আমি তাকে সুস্পষ্ট প্রমাণসহ ফেরাউনের কাছে প্রেরণ করেছিলাম।
null.verse 51:39: অতঃপর সে শক্তিবলে মুখ ফিরিয়ে নিল এবং বললঃ সে হয় যাদুকর, না হয় পাগল।
null.verse 51:40: অতঃপর আমি তাকে ও তার সেনাবাহিনীকে পাকড়াও করলাম এবং তাদেরকে সমুদ্রে নিক্ষেপ করলাম। সে ছিল অভিযুক্ত।
null.verse 51:41: এবং নিদর্শন রয়েছে তাদের কাহিনীতে; যখন আমি তাদের উপর প্রেরণ করেছিলাম অশুভ বায়ু।
null.verse 51:42: এই বায়ু যার উপর দিয়ে প্রবাহিত হয়েছিলঃ তাকেই চুর্ণ-বিচুর্ণ করে দিয়েছিল।
null.verse 51:43: আরও নিদর্শন রয়েছে সামূদের ঘটনায়; যখন তাদেরকে বলা হয়েছিল, কিছুকাল মজা লুটে নাও।
null.verse 51:44: অতঃপর তারা তাদের পালনকর্তার আদেশ অমান্য করল এবং তাদের প্রতি বজ্রঘাত হল এমতাবস্থায় যে, তারা তা দেখেছিল।
null.verse 51:45: অতঃপর তারা দাঁড়াতে সক্ষম হল না এবং কোন প্রতিকারও করতে পারল না।
null.verse 51:46: আমি ইতিপূর্বে নূহের সম্প্রদায়কে ধ্বংস করেছি। নিশ্চিতই তারা ছিল পাপাচারী সম্প্রদায়।
null.verse 51:47: আমি স্বীয় ক্ষমতাবলে আকাশ নির্মাণ করেছি এবং আমি অবশ্যই ব্যাপক ক্ষমতাশালী।
null.verse 51:48: আমি ভূমিকে বিছিয়েছি। আমি কত সুন্দরভাবেই না বিছাতে সক্ষম।
null.verse 51:49: আমি প্রত্যেক বস্তু জোড়ায় জোড়ায় সৃষ্টি করেছি, যাতে তোমরা হৃদয়ঙ্গম কর।
null.verse 51:50: অতএব, আল্লাহর দিকে ধাবিত হও। আমি তাঁর তরফ থেকে তোমাদের জন্যে সুস্পষ্ট সতর্ককারী।
null.verse 51:51: তোমরা আল্লাহর সাথে কোন উপাস্য সাব্যস্ত করো না। আমি তাঁর পক্ষ থেকে তোমাদের জন্য সুস্পষ্ট সতর্ককারী।
null.verse 51:52: এমনিভাবে, তাদের পূর্ববর্তীদের কাছে যখনই কোন রসূল আগমন করেছে, তারা বলছেঃ যাদুকর, না হয় উম্মাদ।
null.verse 51:53: তারা কি একে অপরকে এই উপদেশই দিয়ে গেছে? বস্তুতঃ ওরা দুষ্ট সম্প্রদায়।
null.verse 51:54: অতএব, আপনি ওদের থেকে মুখ ফিরিয়ে নিন। এতে আপনি অপরাধী হবেন না।
null.verse 51:55: এবং বোঝাতে থাকুন; কেননা, বোঝানো মুমিনদের উপকারে আসবে।
null.verse 51:56: আমার এবাদত করার জন্যই আমি মানব ও জিন জাতি সৃষ্টি করেছি।
null.verse 51:57: আমি তাদের কাছে জীবিকা চাই না এবং এটাও চাই না যে, তারা আমাকে আহার্য যোগাবে।
null.verse 51:58: আল্লাহ তা’আলাই তো জীবিকাদাতা শক্তির আধার, পরাক্রান্ত।
null.verse 51:59: অতএব, এই যালেমদের প্রাপ্য তাই, যা ওদের অতীত সহচরদের প্রাপ্য ছিল। কাজেই ওরা যেন আমার কাছে তা তাড়াতাড়ি না চায়।
null.verse 51:60: অতএব, কাফেরদের জন্যে দুর্ভোগ সেই দিনের, যেদিনের প্রতিশ্রুতি ওদেরকে দেয়া হয়েছে। চায়।

Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 51:1: Кълна се в отвяващите с веене
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 51:5: че е истина това, което ви е обещано!
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 51:7: Кълна се в небето, осеяно с пътища!
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 51:9: Отклонява се от него онзи, който е бил отклонен.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 51:13: В този Ден върху Огъня ще бъдат измъчвани.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 51:14: Вкусете своето мъчение! Това е, за което бързахте.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 51:15: Богобоязливите ще бъдат сред градини и извори,
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 51:16: ще взимат онова, което им дарява техният Господ.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 51:18: и на развиделяване молеха за опрощение,
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 51:19: и в техните имоти имаше дял за просяка и нуждаещия се.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 51:20: За убедените на земята има знамения
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 51:22: На небето има препитание за вас и там е онова, което ви е обещано.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 51:23: А то, кълна се в Господа на небето и на земята, е истина, както това, че говорите.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 51:24: Стигна ли до теб разказът за почетните гости на Ибрахим?
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 51:25: Влязоха при него и рекоха: Мир! Каза: Мир! И си рече: Непознати хора!
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 51:26: И без да го видят, свърна към своето семейство и дойде с тлъсто
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 51:30: И пристъпи жена му с вик, удряйки лицето си, и рече: Но аз съм бездeтна старица!
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 51:32: Рече: А какво ви е намерението, о, пратеници?
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 51:34: за да изсипем върху тях камъни от глина,
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 51:35: белязани при твоя Господ за прекаляващите.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 51:36: И изведохме Ние само вярващите, които бяха там.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 51:37: И намерихме там отдадени [на Аллах] само в един дом.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 51:38: И оставихме там знамение за онези, които се страхуват от болезненото мъчение.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 51:40: И се отвърна той със своята опора, и каза: Магьосник или луд.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 51:41: И сграбчихме него и войските му, и ги хвърлихме в морето.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 51:42: И за адитите, срещу които изпратихме опустошителния вятър.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 51:43: И не остави той нищо, над което премина, без да го превърне в прах.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 51:44: И за самудяните, когато им бе казано: Наслаждавайте се до време!
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 51:45: И се възгордяха пред повелята на техния Господ,
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 51:46: мълнията ги порази, както си гледаха.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 51:47: И не можаха да се изправят, и не им се помогна.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 51:53: И от всяко нещо сътворихме двойки, за да се поучите!
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 51:54: Затова към Аллах се устремете! Аз съм Негов явен предупредител за вас.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 51:55: И не приемайте друг Бог заедно с Аллах! Аз съм Негов явен предупредител за вас.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 51:56: Така и онези преди тях, щом дойдеше пратеник, казваха: Магьосник или луд.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 51:57: Нима си завещаваха това един другиму? Не, ала те са престъпващи хора.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 51:58: Отвърни се от тях и не ще бъдеш упрекван!
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 51:59: И поучавай! Наистина поучението носи полза на вярващите.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 51:60: Сътворих Аз джиновете и хората единствено за да Ми служат.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 51:61: Не искам от тях препитание и не искам да Ме хранят.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 51:62: Аллах! Той е Даващия препитанието, Владетеля на силата, Всемогъщия.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 51:63: Угнетителите имат участ като участта на техните другари.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 51:64: Горко на неверниците в техния Ден, който им е обещан! избързват!

null.verse 51:1: 誓以播種者，
null.verse 51:5: 警告你們的事確是真實的，
null.verse 51:6: 報應確是要發生的。
null.verse 51:7: 以有軌道的諸天盟誓，
null.verse 51:8: 你們確是各執一說的，
null.verse 51:9: 原被阻遏者，將被阻遏，而不得到達他。
null.verse 51:11: 他們浸沉在愚昧之中，他們是昏憒的。
null.verse 51:12: 他們問報應日在什麼時候，
null.verse 51:13: 那是他們在火刑上受刑之日。
null.verse 51:14: 你們嘗試你們的刑罰吧！這就是你們要求早日實現的。
null.verse 51:15: 敬畏的人們必定在許多樂園中，在許多泉源畔，
null.verse 51:16: 接受他們的主所賞賜的。他們在生前確是行善的，
null.verse 51:17: 他們在夜間只稍稍睡一下，
null.verse 51:18: 他們在黎明時向主求饒，
null.verse 51:19: 他們的財產中，有乞丐和貧民的權利。
null.verse 51:20: 在大地上對於篤信的人們，有許多跡象；
null.verse 51:21: 在你們自身中也有許多跡象，難道你們看不見嗎？
null.verse 51:22: 在天上，有你們的給養，也有應許你們的賞罰。
null.verse 51:23: 以天地的主盟誓，這確是真實的，猶如你們能說話一樣。
null.verse 51:24: 關於易卜拉欣的受優待的賓客的故事，已來臨你了嗎？
null.verse 51:25: 當時，他們進去見他，他們說：「祝你平安！」他說：「祝你們平安！」他想這些是生客。
null.verse 51:26: 於是他悄悄地走到他的家屬那裡，拿來一頭肥嫩的牛犢，
null.verse 51:27: 他把那牛犢送到客人面前，說：「你們怎麼不吃呢！」
null.verse 51:28: 他為他們而心懷恐懼。他們說：「你不要恐懼。」他們以一個有學識的兒童向他報喜。
null.verse 51:29: 他的女人便喊叫著走來，她打自己的臉，說：「我是一個不能生育的老婦人。」
null.verse 51:30: 他們說：「你的主是這樣說的，他確是至睿的，確是全知的。」
null.verse 51:31: 他說：「諸位使者啊！你們有什麼差事呢？」
null.verse 51:32: 他們說：「我們確已奉派去懲治一群犯罪的民眾，
null.verse 51:33: 我們將因毀滅他們而降下黏土變成的石頭，
null.verse 51:34: 那是從你的主那裡為過分者而發出的。」
null.verse 51:35: 我把城裡所有的信士都救了出來，
null.verse 51:36: 我在城裡只發現一家歸順者。
null.verse 51:37: 我曾在城裡留下一種跡象，以便畏懼痛苦的刑罰的人們用作鑒戒。
null.verse 51:38: 在穆薩的故事裡也有一種跡象。當時，我曾派遣他帶著一件明証去見法老。
null.verse 51:39: 但法老因有勢力故背棄穆薩，他說：「這是一個術士，或是一個瘋人。」
null.verse 51:40: 所以我懲治他和他的軍隊，而將他們投入海中，他是受責備的。
null.verse 51:41: 在阿德人的故事裡，也有一種跡象。當時，我曾使無益的暴風去毀滅他們，
null.verse 51:42: 凡經那暴風吹過的東西，無一不變成破碎的。
null.verse 51:43: 在賽莫德人的故事裡，也有一種跡象。當時，有人對他們說：「你們暫時享受吧！」
null.verse 51:44: 他們曾違抗他們主的命令，故疾雷毀滅了他們，同時，他們眼見刑罰降臨，
null.verse 51:45: 他們未能站起，他們也未能自衛。
null.verse 51:46: 以前，我毀滅了努哈的宗族，他們確是悖逆的民眾。
null.verse 51:47: 天，我曾以權力建造它，我確是大能的；
null.verse 51:48: 地，我曾鋪張它。美哉鋪張者！
null.verse 51:49: 我將每種物造成配偶，以便你們覺悟。
null.verse 51:50: 你說：「你們應當逃歸真主，我對於你們確是一個坦率的警告者。
null.verse 51:51: 你們不要以別的神靈與真主同受崇拜，我對於你們確是一個坦率的警告者。」
null.verse 51:52: 他們以前的各民族也象這樣，每有一個使者來臨他們，他們就說：「他是一個術士，或是一個瘋人。」
null.verse 51:53: 難道他們曾以此話互相囑咐嗎？不然，他們都是悖逆的民眾。
null.verse 51:54: 你應當退避他們，你絕不是受責備的。
null.verse 51:55: 你應當教誨眾人，因為教誨對於信士們確是有益的。
null.verse 51:56: 我創造精靈和人類，只為要他們崇拜我。
null.verse 51:57: 我不望他們的供給，我也不望他們的奉養。
null.verse 51:58: 真主確是供給萬物的，確是有權力的，確是堅定的。
null.verse 51:59: 不義的人們，和他們的朋友一樣，必得一份刑罰，所以叫他們不要催促我。
null.verse 51:60: 傷哉不信道的人們！當他們被警告的日子來臨的時候。 不義的人們，和他們的朋友一樣，必得一份刑罰，所以叫他們不要催促我。

null.verse 51:1: Při rychle běžících,
null.verse 51:5: To, co vám je slíbeno, je vskutku pravdivé
null.verse 51:6: a soud dozajista nastane!
null.verse 51:7: Při nebi plném drah hvězdných,
null.verse 51:8: vy libujete si v řečech rozporných,
null.verse 51:9: od nichž odvrátí se ten, kdo byl odvrácen.
null.verse 51:11: kteří v hlouposti své jsou lhostejní
null.verse 51:12: a ptají se: "Kdy dostaví se den poslední?"
null.verse 51:13: V den, kdy budou ohněm zkoušeni!
null.verse 51:14: Okuste tuto svou zkoušku! Tohle je to, co přáli jste si uspíšit!
null.verse 51:15: Však v zahradách a u pramenů bohabojní budou dlít
null.verse 51:16: přijímajíce to, co Pán jejich jim dává, neb před tím dobré skutky konali
null.verse 51:17: a jen malou část noci spávali
null.verse 51:18: a za úsvitu o odpuštění prosívali
null.verse 51:19: a ze svých majetků vždy patřičně žebrákům a nemajetným dávali.
null.verse 51:20: Na zemi znamení jsou pro věřící přesvědčené,
null.verse 51:21: a také ve vašich duších.
null.verse 51:22: A na nebesích je váš příděl obživy a rovněž to, co vám je slíbeno.
null.verse 51:23: Při Pánu nebes i země, toto je skutečnost stejná jako to, že hovoříte.
null.verse 51:24: Zdaž doneslo se ti o Abrahamových poctěných hostech vyprávění?
null.verse 51:25: Hle, vešli k němu a pravili "Mír", a on odvětil: "I vám mír, lidé neznámí!"
null.verse 51:26: A k rodině své odešel a tučné tele připravil
null.verse 51:27: a se slovy "Což jíst nebudete?" jim je předložil.
null.verse 51:28: A pocítil strach před nimi, však oni mu pak pravili "Neboj se!" a zvěst o narození chlapce moudrého mu oznámili.
null.verse 51:29: Pak žena jeho přiběhla vzrušena a do tváře se bila a volala: "Vždyť já neplodná jsem již stařena!"
null.verse 51:30: I odpověděli: "Takto Pán tvůj děl a On věru moudrý je i vševědoucí.
null.verse 51:31: A otázal se Abraham: "Jaká věc vás přivádí, vyslanci?"
null.verse 51:32: Odvětili: "Posláni jsme byli mezi lidi hříšné,
null.verse 51:33: abychom na ně seslali kameny z hlíny pálené,
null.verse 51:34: u Pána tvého jmény přestupníků označené.
null.verse 51:35: Ty z nich, kdož věřící byli, jsme odtamtud vyvedli,
null.verse 51:36: však dům jen jediný těch, kdož do vůle Boží se odevzdali, jsme tam nalezli.
null.verse 51:37: A zanechali jsme je jako znamení těm, kdo trestu bolestného se obávají.
null.verse 51:39: ten však se obrátil i se svou oporou a prohlásil: "Kouzelník je to nebo blázen!"
null.verse 51:40: A uchvátili jsme jej i vojska jeho a do moře jsme je uvrhli, neb pokárání byl hoden.
null.verse 51:42: jež nic z toho, nad čím se převalila, nenechala, aby v prach to neproměnila.
null.verse 51:44: Však rozkazu Pána svého neposlechli a zemětřesení je postihlo, zatímco se dívali,
null.verse 51:45: a nebyli schopni se zpříma postavit a nebylo jim pomoci.
null.verse 51:47: Nebe jsme důkladně postavili, vždyť My jsme rozšiřovateli,
null.verse 51:48: a zemi jsme rozprostřeli - a jak výteční jsme v tom byli!
null.verse 51:49: A každou věc jsme v párech stvořili - snad si to připomenete!
null.verse 51:50: K Bohu se utíkejte, neb já jsem od Něho pro vás varovatel zjevný,
null.verse 51:51: a nepřidružujte k Bohu žádné jiné božstvo, neb já jsem od Něho pro vás varovatel zjevný!
null.verse 51:52: A stejně tak nepřišel k těm, kdož před těmito byli, žádný posel, aby o něm neprohlásili: "Kouzelník je to nebo blázen!"
null.verse 51:53: Což po sobě to dědí? Nikoliv, však lid je to vzpurný.
null.verse 51:54: Odvrať se proto od nich, a nebudeš za to kárán!
null.verse 51:55: Připomínej, vždyť připomenutí je věřícím prospěšné!
null.verse 51:56: A džiny a lidi jsem jedině proto stvořil, aby Mne uctívali,
null.verse 51:57: a nechci od nich žádný příděl obživy a netoužím po tom, aby Mne živili,
null.verse 51:58: vždyť Bůh sám je živitel, vládce síly a nezviklatelný!
null.verse 51:59: Věru těm, kdož křivdili, se dostane přídělu podobného, přídělu jim rovných před nimi; nechť se tedy o uspíšení nesnaží!
null.verse 51:60: Běda nevěřícím v ten jejich den, jenž byl jim přislíben! nesnaží!

null.verse 51:1: (Wij roepen als getuigen) degenen die wijd en zijd verspreiden,
null.verse 51:2: En degenen die de last dragen,
null.verse 51:4: En degenen die de zaak uitdelen.
null.verse 51:5: Voorzeker, hetgeen u is beloofd, is waar,
null.verse 51:6: En voorwaar, het gericht zal zeker plaats hebben.
null.verse 51:7: Bij de hemelen vol van paden,
null.verse 51:8: Waarlijk gij hebt uiteenlopende meningen,
null.verse 51:9: Daarvan wordt afgewend wie zich (van het ware geloof) afwendt.
null.verse 51:10: Vervloekt zijn zij die vermoedens uiten.
null.verse 51:11: Die onachtzaam zijn in onwetendheid.
null.verse 51:12: Zij vragen: "Wanneer zal de Tijd des Gerichts zijn?"
null.verse 51:13: Het zal op de Dag zijn, wanneer zij in het Vuur zullen worden beproefd.
null.verse 51:14: "Ondergaat uw beproeving.
null.verse 51:15: Maar de rechtvaardigen zullen te midden van tuinen en bronnen verkeren,
null.verse 51:16: Nemend hetgeen hun Heer zal geven omdat zij voorheen goed plachten te doen.
null.verse 51:17: Gedurende de nacht sliepen zij weinig.
null.verse 51:18: Tijdens de morgenstond zochten zij vergiffenis.
null.verse 51:19: En van hun rijkdommen was een deel voor de bedelaars en ook voor degenen die niet konden bedelen.
null.verse 51:20: En er zijn tekenen op aarde voor hen die zekerheid van geloof willen hebben,
null.verse 51:21: En ook in uzelf, wilt gij dat niet inzien?
null.verse 51:22: En in de hemel is uw onderhoud en hetgeen u is beloofd.
null.verse 51:23: Bij de Heer van de hemel en de aarde - dit is inderdaad de waarheid zoals gij spreekt.
null.verse 51:24: Heeft het verhaal van Abrahams geeerde gasten u bereikt?
null.verse 51:25: Toen zij bij hem binnentraden en zeiden: "Vrede", antwoordde hij: "Vrede".
null.verse 51:26: Maar hij ging rustig naar zijn gezin en bracht een (toebereid) vet kalf.
null.verse 51:27: En plaatste het voor hen.
null.verse 51:28: Daarop begon hij hen te vrezen.
null.verse 51:29: Toen kwam zijn vrouw, in verbijstering en sloeg de hand voor het gezicht en zeide: "Een verwelkte, bejaarde vrouw!"
null.verse 51:30: "Uw Heer heeft het zo gezegd," zeiden zij.
null.verse 51:31: Abraham zeide: "Wat is uw taak, o boodsehappers?"
null.verse 51:32: Zij antwoordden: "Wij zijn naar een schuldig volk gezonden
null.verse 51:33: Om brokken klei op hen neder te zenden
null.verse 51:34: Door uw Heer gemerkt (ter verdelging) voor de buitensporigen.
null.verse 51:35: De gelovigen die daarin waren lieten Wij (veilig) weggaan.
null.verse 51:36: Maar Wij vonden er slechts één huis der Moslims.
null.verse 51:37: En Wij lieten daarin een teken achter voor hen, die de pijnlijke straf vrezen.
null.verse 51:38: En in Mozes (is eveneens een teken), toen Wij hem tot Pharao zonden met openlijk gezag.
null.verse 51:39: Maar deze wendde zich af om zijn macht en zeide: "Een tovenaar of een waanzinnige.
null.verse 51:40: Daarom grepen Wij hem en zijn scharen en wierpen hen in de zee, waardoor hij zelfverwijt kreeg.
null.verse 51:41: En er was een teken in de Aad, toen Wij een orkaan tegen hen zonden.
null.verse 51:42: Deze liet van hetgeen hij teisterde niets over of hij maakte het als as,
null.verse 51:43: En er was een teken in de Samoed toen er tot hen werd gezegd: "Vermaakt u voor een wijle.
null.verse 51:44: Maar zij overtraden het gebod van hun Heer.
null.verse 51:45: En zij konden niet opstaan noch konden zij zich hiertegen beschermen.
null.verse 51:46: En in het volk van Noach (is ook een teken), voorwaar zij waren een ongehoorzaam volk.
null.verse 51:47: Voorzeker Wij bouwden de hemel door Onze macht en waarlijk Wij zin het, Die hem hebben uitgebreid.
null.verse 51:48: En Wij hebben de aarde uitgespreid en hoe uitmuntend hebben Wij dit gedaan.
null.verse 51:49: En Wij hebben alles in paren geschapen opdat gij er lering uit moogt trekken.
null.verse 51:50: Haast u daarom tot God.
null.verse 51:51: En werpt geen andere God op naast God, waarlijk ik ben voor u een duidelijke waarschuwer van Hem.
null.verse 51:52: En er kwam tot degenen, die vóór hen waren, geen boodschapper of zij zeiden: "Dit is een tovenaar of een bezetene!"
null.verse 51:53: Hebben zij elkander er toe aangespoord? Neen, zij zijn een opstandig volk.
null.verse 51:54: Wend u daarom van hen af en u zal niets worden verweten.
null.verse 51:55: Maar ga door met het vermanen want de vermaning helpt degenen die willen geloven.
null.verse 51:56: En ik heb de djinn en de mensen slechts tot Mijn aanbidding geschapen.
null.verse 51:57: Ik wens van hen geen onderhoud noch wens Ik dat zij Mij zullen voeden.
null.verse 51:58: Voorzeker, God is de grootste Voorziener, de Almachtige, de Alsterke.
null.verse 51:59: Voorzeker het lot der onrechtvaardigen is gelijk aan dat van hun gezellen.
null.verse 51:60: Wee over de ongelovigen vanwege de Dag waarmede zij worden bedreigd! verhaasten.

Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 51:1: By those that winnow with a winnowing
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 51:2: And those that bear the burden (of the rain)
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 51:3: And those that glide with ease (upon the sea)
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 51:4: And those who distribute (blessings) by command,
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 51:5: Lo! that wherewith ye are threatened is indeed true,
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 51:6: And lo! the judgment will indeed befall.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 51:7: By the heaven full of paths,
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 51:8: Lo! ye, forsooth, are of various opinion (concerning the truth).
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 51:9: He is made to turn away from it who is (himself) averse.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 51:11: Who are careless in an abyss!
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 51:12: They ask: When is the Day of Judgment ?
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 51:13: (It is) the day when they will be tormented at the Fire,
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 51:14: (And it will be said unto them): Taste your torment (which ye inflicted).
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 51:15: Lo! those who keep from evil will dwell amid gardens and watersprings,
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 51:16: Taking that which their Lord giveth them; for lo! aforetime they were doers of good;
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 51:17: They used to sleep but little of the night,
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 51:18: And ere the dawning of each day would seek forgiveness,
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 51:19: And in their wealth the beggar and the outcast had due share.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 51:20: And in the earth are portents for those whose faith is sure.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 51:22: And in the heaven is your providence and that which ye are promised;
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 51:23: And by the Lord of the heavens and the earth, it is the truth, even as (it is true) that ye speak.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 51:24: Hath the story of Abraham’s honoured guests reached thee (O Muhammad) ?
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 51:25: When they came in unto him and said: Peace! he answered, Peace! (and thought): Folk unknown (to me).
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 51:26: Then he went apart unto his housefolk so that they brought a fatted calf;
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 51:27: And he set it before them, saying: Will ye not eat ?
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 51:28: Then he conceived a fear of them.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 51:29: Then his wife came forward, making moan, and smote her face, and cried: A barren old woman!
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 51:30: They said: Even so saith thy Lord.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 51:31: (Abraham) said: And (afterward) what is your errand, O ye sent (from Allah) ?
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 51:32: They said: Lo! we are sent unto a guilty folk,
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 51:33: That we may send upon them stones of clay,
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 51:34: Marked by thy Lord for (the destruction of) the wanton.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 51:35: Then we brought forth such believers as were there.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 51:36: But We found there but one house of those surrendered (to Allah).
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 51:37: And We left behind therein a portent for those who fear a painful doom.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 51:38: And in Moses (too, there is a portent) when We sent him unto Pharaoh with clear warrant,
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 51:39: But he withdrew (confiding) in his might, and said: A wizard or a madman.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 51:40: So We seized him and his hosts and flung them in the sea, for he was reprobate.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 51:41: And in (the tribe of) A’ad (there is a portent) when we sent the fatal wind against them.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 51:42: It spared naught that it reached, but made it (all) as dust.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 51:43: And in (the tribe of) Thamud (there is a portent) when it was told them: Take your ease awhile.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 51:44: But they rebelled against their Lord’s decree, and so the thunderbolt overtook them even while they gazed;
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 51:45: And they were unable to rise up, nor could they help themselves.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 51:46: And the folk of Noah aforetime.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 51:47: We have built the heaven with might, and We it is Who make the vast extent (thereof).
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 51:48: And the earth have We laid out, how gracious is the Spreader (thereof)!
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 51:49: And all things We have created by pairs, that haply ye may reflect.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 51:50: Therefor flee unto Allah; lo! I am a plain warner unto you from him.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 51:51: And set not any other god along with Allah; lo! I am a plain warner unto you from Him.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 51:52: Even so there came no messenger unto those before them but they said: A wizard or a madman!
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 51:53: Have they handed down (the saying) as an heirloom one unto another ? Nay, but they are froward folk.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 51:54: So withdraw from them (O Muhammad), for thou art in no wise blameworthy,
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 51:55: And warn, for warning profiteth believers.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 51:56: I created the jinn and humankind only that they might worship Me.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 51:57: I seek no livelihood from them, nor do I ask that they should feed
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 51:58: Lo! Allah! He it is that giveth livelihood, the Lord of unbreakable might.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 51:59: And lo! for those who (now) do wrong there is an evil day like unto the evil day (which came for) their likes (of old); so let them not ask Me to hasten on (that day).
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 51:60: And woe unto those who disbelieve, from (that) their day which they are promised.

Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 51:2: And those that lift and bear away heavy weights;
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 51:3: And those that flow with ease and gentleness;
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 51:4: And those that distribute and apportion by Command;-
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 51:5: Verily that which ye are promised is true;
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 51:6: And verily Judgment and Justice must indeed come to pass.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 51:7: By the Sky with (its) numerous Paths,
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 51:8: Truly ye are in a doctrine discordant,
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 51:9: Through which are deluded (away from the Truth) such as would be deluded.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 51:11: Those who (flounder) heedless in a flood of confusion:
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 51:12: They ask, "When will be the Day of Judgment and Justice?"
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 51:13: (It will be) a Day when they will be tried (and tested) over the Fire!
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 51:14: "Taste ye your trial! This is what ye used to ask to be hastened!"
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 51:15: As to the Righteous, they will be in the midst of Gardens and Springs,
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 51:16: Taking joy in the things which their Lord gives them, because, before then, they lived a good life.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 51:17: They were in the habit of sleeping but little by night,
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 51:18: And in the hour of early dawn, they (were found) praying for Forgiveness;
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 51:19: And in their wealth and possessions (was remembered) the right of the (needy,) him who asked, and him who (for some reason) was prevented (from asking).
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 51:20: On the earth are signs for those of assured Faith,
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 51:21: As also in your own selves: Will ye not then see?
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 51:22: And in heaven is your Sustenance, as (also) that which ye are promised.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 51:23: Then, by the Lord of heaven and earth, this is the very Truth, as much as the fact that ye can speak intelligently to each other.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 51:24: Has the story reached thee, of the honoured guests of Abraham?
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 51:25: Behold, they entered his presence, and said: "Peace!" He said, "Peace!" (and thought, "These seem) unusual people.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 51:26: Then he turned quickly to his household, brought out a fatted calf,
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 51:28: (When they did not eat), He conceived a fear of them.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 51:29: But his wife came forward (laughing) aloud: she smote her forehead and said: "A barren old woman!"
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 51:30: They said, "Even so has thy Lord spoken: and He is full of Wisdom and Knowledge.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 51:31: (Abraham) said: "And what, O ye Messengers, is your errand (now)?"
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 51:32: They said, "We have been sent to a people (deep) in sin;-
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 51:33: "To bring on, on them, (a shower of) stones of clay (brimstone),
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 51:34: "Marked as from thy Lord for those who trespass beyond bounds.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 51:35: Then We evacuated those of the Believers who were there,
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 51:36: But We found not there any just (Muslim) persons except in one house:
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 51:37: And We left there a Sign for such as fear the Grievous Penalty.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 51:38: And in Moses (was another Sign): Behold, We sent him to Pharaoh, with authority manifest.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 51:39: But (Pharaoh) turned back with his Chiefs, and said, "A sorcerer, or one possessed!"
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 51:40: So We took him and his forces, and threw them into the sea; and his was the blame.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 51:41: And in the ’Ad (people) (was another Sign): Behold, We sent against them the devastating Wind:
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 51:42: It left nothing whatever that it came up against, but reduced it to ruin and rottenness.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 51:43: And in the Thamud (was another Sign): Behold, they were told, "Enjoy (your brief day) for a little while!"
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 51:44: But they insolently defied the Command of their Lord: So the stunning noise (of an earthquake) seized them, even while they were looking on.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 51:45: Then they could not even stand (on their feet), nor could they help themselves.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 51:46: So were the People of Noah before them for they wickedly transgressed.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 51:47: With power and skill did We construct the Firmament: for it is We Who create the vastness of pace.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 51:48: And We have spread out the (spacious) earth: How excellently We do spread out!
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 51:49: And of every thing We have created pairs: That ye may receive instruction.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 51:50: Hasten ye then (at once) to God: I am from Him a Warner to you, clear and open!
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 51:51: And make not another an object of worship with God: I am from Him a Warner to you, clear and open!
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 51:52: Similarly, no apostle came to the Peoples before them, but they said (of him) in like manner, "A sorcerer, or one possessed"!
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 51:53: Is this the legacy they have transmitted, one to another? Nay, they are themselves a people transgressing beyond bounds!
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 51:54: So turn away from them: not thine is the blame.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 51:55: But teach (thy Message) for teaching benefits the Believers.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 51:56: I have only created Jinns and men, that they may serve Me.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 51:57: No Sustenance do I require of them, nor do I require that they should feed Me.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 51:58: For God is He Who gives (all) Sustenance,- Lord of Power,- Steadfast (for ever).
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 51:59: For the Wrong-doers, their portion is like unto the portion of their fellows (of earlier generations): then let them not ask Me to hasten (that portion)!
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 51:60: Woe, then, to the Unbelievers, on account of that Day of theirs which they have been promised!

Arthur J. Arberry.verse 51:5: surely that you are promised is true,
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 51:6: and surely the Doom is about to fall!
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 51:7: By heaven with all its tracks
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 51:12: asking, ’When shall be the Day of Doom?’
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 51:13: Upon the day when they shall be tried at the Fire:
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 51:14: ’Taste your trial! This is that you were seeking to hasten.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 51:15: Surely the godfearing shall be among gardens and fountains
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 51:16: taking whatsoever their Lord has given them; they were good-doers before that.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 51:17: Little of the night would they slumber,
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 51:18: and in the mornings they would ask for forgiveness;
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 51:19: and the beggar and the outcast had a share in their wealth.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 51:20: In the earth are signs for those having sure faith;
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 51:21: and in your selves; what, do you not see?
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 51:22: And in heaven is your provision, and that you are promised.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 51:23: So by the Lord of heaven and earth, it is as surely true as that you have speech.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 51:24: Hast thou received the story of the honoured guests of Abraham?
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 51:25: When they entered unto him, saying ’Peace!’ he said ’Peace! You are a people unknown to me.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 51:26: Then he turned to his household and brought a fattened calf,
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 51:27: and he laid it before them saying, ’Will you not eat?’
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 51:28: Then he conceived a fear of them.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 51:29: Then came forward his wife, clamouring, and she smote her face, and said, ’An old woman, barren!’
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 51:30: They said, ’So says thy Lord; He is the All-wise, the All-knowing.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 51:31: Said he, ’And what is your business, envoys?’
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 51:32: They said, ’We have been sent to a people of sinners,
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 51:33: to loose upon them stones of clay
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 51:34: marked with thy Lord for the prodigal.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 51:35: So We brought forth such believers as were in it,
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 51:36: but We found not therein except one house of those that have surrendered themselves.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 51:37: And therein We left a sign to those who fear the painful chastisement.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 51:38: And also in Moses, when We sent him unto Pharaoh, with a clear authority,
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 51:39: but he turned his back, with his court, saying, ’A sorcerer, or a man possessed!’
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 51:40: So We seized him and his hosts, and We cast them into the sea, and he blameworthy.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 51:41: And also in Ad, when We loosed against them the withering wind
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 51:42: that left nothing it came upon, but made it as stuff decayed.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 51:43: And also in Thamood, when it was said to them, ’Take your enjoyment for a while!’
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 51:44: Then they turned in disdain from the commandment of their Lord, and the thunderbolt took them and they themselves beholding
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 51:45: and they were not able to stand upright, and were not helped.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 51:46: And the people of Noah before; surely they were an ungodly people.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 51:47: And heaven -- We built it with might, and We extend it wide.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 51:48: And the earth -- We spread it forth; O excellent Smoothers!
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 51:49: And of everything created We two kinds; haply you will remember
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 51:50: Therefore flee unto God! I am a clear warner from Him to you.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 51:51: And set not up with God another god; I am a clear warner from Him to you.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 51:52: Even so not a Messenger came to those before them but they said, ’A sorcerer, or a man possessed!’
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 51:53: What, have they bequeathed it one to another? Nay, but they are an insolent people.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 51:54: So turn thou from them; thou wilt not be reproached.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 51:55: And remind; the Reminder profits the believers.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 51:56: I have not created jinn and mankind except to serve Me.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 51:57: I desire of them no provision, neither do I desire that they should feed Me.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 51:58: Surely God is the All-provider, the Possessor of Strength, the Ever-Sure.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 51:59: The evildoers shall have their portion, like the portion of their fellows; so let them not hasten Me!
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 51:60: So woe to the unbelievers, for that day of theirs that they are promised.

Muhammad Asad.verse 51:1: CONSIDER the winds that scatter the dust far and wide,
Muhammad Asad.verse 51:2: and those that carry the burden [of heavy clouds],
Muhammad Asad.verse 51:3: and those that speed along with gentle ease,
Muhammad Asad.verse 51:4: and those that apportion [the gift of life] at
Muhammad Asad.verse 51:6: Verily, that which you are promised is true indeed,
Muhammad Asad.verse 51:7: and, verily, judgment is bound to come!
Muhammad Asad.verse 51:8: CONSIDER the firmament full of starry paths!
Muhammad Asad.verse 51:9: Verily, [O men,] you are deeply at variance as to what to believe:
Muhammad Asad.verse 51:10: perverted in his views thereon is he who would deceive himself!
Muhammad Asad.verse 51:11: They but destroy themselves, they who are given to guessing at what they cannot ascertain
Muhammad Asad.verse 51:12: they who blunder along, in ignorance lost
Muhammad Asad.verse 51:14: ask, "When is that Day of Judgment to be?"
Muhammad Asad.verse 51:15: [It will be] a Day when they will be sorely tried by the fire,
Muhammad Asad.verse 51:16: [and will be told:] "Taste this your trial! It is this that you were so hastily asking for!"
Muhammad Asad.verse 51:18: behold, the God-conscious will find themselves amid gardens and springs,
Muhammad Asad.verse 51:19: enjoying all that their Sustainer will have granted them ,
Muhammad Asad.verse 51:20: verily, they were doers of good in the past:
Muhammad Asad.verse 51:21: they would lie asleep during but a small part of the night,
Muhammad Asad.verse 51:22: and would pray for forgiveness from their innermost hearts;
Muhammad Asad.verse 51:23: and [would assign] in all that they possessed a due share unto such as might ask [for help] and such as might suffer privation.
Muhammad Asad.verse 51:24: AND ON EARTH there are signs [of God’s existence, visible] to all who are endowed with inner certainty,
Muhammad Asad.verse 51:25: just as [there are signs thereof] within your own selves: can you not, then, see?
Muhammad Asad.verse 51:26: And in heaven is [the source of] your sustenance [on earth] and
Muhammad Asad.verse 51:27: all that you are promised [for your life after death]:
Muhammad Asad.verse 51:28: for, by the Sustainer of heaven and earth, this [life after death] is the very truth – as true as that you are endowed with speech!
Muhammad Asad.verse 51:29: AND HAS the story of Abraham’s honoured guests ever come within thy ken?
Muhammad Asad.verse 51:30: When those [heavenly messengers] came unto him and bade him peace, he answered, "[And upon you be] peace!" – [saying to himself,] "They are strangers.
Muhammad Asad.verse 51:31: Then he turned quietly to his household, and brought forth a fat
Muhammad Asad.verse 51:33: and placed it before them, saying, "Will you not eat?"
Muhammad Asad.verse 51:34: [And when he saw that the guests would not eat,] he became apprehensive of them;
Muhammad Asad.verse 51:35: they said, "Fear not" – and gave him the glad tiding of [the birth of] a son who would be endowed with deep knowledge.
Muhammad Asad.verse 51:36: Thereupon his wife approached [the guests] with a loud cry, and struck her face [in astonishment] and exclaimed: "A barren old woman [like me]!"
Muhammad Asad.verse 51:37: They answered: "Thus has thy Sustainer decreed; and, verily, He alone is truly wise, all-knowing!"
Muhammad Asad.verse 51:40: may you have in view, O you
Muhammad Asad.verse 51:42: They answered: "Behold, we have been sent unto a people lost in sin,
Muhammad Asad.verse 51:43: to let loose upon them stone-hard blows of chastisement,
Muhammad Asad.verse 51:44: marked out in thy Sustainer’s sight for [the punishment of] such as have wasted their own selves.
Muhammad Asad.verse 51:45: And in the course of time We brought out [of Lot’s city] such
Muhammad Asad.verse 51:48: house We did not find there any who had surrendered themselves to Us.
Muhammad Asad.verse 51:49: And so We left therein a message for those who fear the grievous suffering [which awaits all evildoers].
Muhammad Asad.verse 51:50: AND IN [the story of Pharaoh and] Moses, too, [We left the same message: for] when We sent him unto Pharaoh with
Muhammad Asad.verse 51:52: and he turned away in [the pride of] his power and said, "A sorcerer [is this Moses], or a madman!"
Muhammad Asad.verse 51:53: We seized him and his hosts, and cast them all into the sea: and [none but Pharaoh] himself was to blame [for what happened].
Muhammad Asad.verse 51:54: And [you have the same message] in [what happened to the tribe of] ’ād, when We let loose against them that life-destroying wind
Muhammad Asad.verse 51:55: which spared nothing of what it came upon, but caused [all of] it to become like bones dead and decayed.
Muhammad Asad.verse 51:56: And in [the story of the tribe of] Thamūd, too, when they were told, "You shall enjoy your life for
Muhammad Asad.verse 51:58: after they had turned with disdain from their Sustainer’s commandment – whereupon the thunderbolt of punishment overtook them while they were
Muhammad Asad.verse 51:60: for they were unable even to rise, and could not defend themselves.
Muhammad Asad.verse 51:61: And [thus, too, We destroyed] Noah’s people aforetime: for they were iniquitous folk.
Muhammad Asad.verse 51:62: AND IT IS We who have built the universe with [Our creative] power; and, verily, it is We who are steadily expanding it.
Muhammad Asad.verse 51:63: And the earth have We spread out wide – and how well have We ordered it!
Muhammad Asad.verse 51:64: And in everything have We created opposites, so that you might bear in mind [that God alone is one].
Muhammad Asad.verse 51:65: And so, [O Muhammad, say unto them:] "Flee unto God [from all that is false and evil]! Verily, I am a plain warner to you from Him!
Muhammad Asad.verse 51:66: And do not ascribe divinity to aught side by side with God: verily, I am a plain warner to you from Him!"
Muhammad Asad.verse 51:68: thus it is: never yet came any apostle to those who lived before their time but they said, "A spellbinder [is he], or a madman!"
Muhammad Asad.verse 51:69: Have they, perchance, handed down this [way of thinking] as a legacy unto one another? Nay, they are people filled with overweening arrogance!
Muhammad Asad.verse 51:70: Turn, then, away from them, and thou shalt incur no blame;
Muhammad Asad.verse 51:71: yet go on reminding [all who would listen]: for, verily, such a reminder will profit the believers.
Muhammad Asad.verse 51:72: And [tell them that] I have not created the invisible beings and men to any end other than that they may [know and] worship Me.
Muhammad Asad.verse 51:73: [But withal,] no sustenance do I ever demand of them, nor do I demand that they feed Me:
Muhammad Asad.verse 51:74: for, verily, God Himself is the Provider of all sustenance, the Lord of all might, the Eternal!
Muhammad Asad.verse 51:75: And, verily, they who are bent on doing evil shall have their share [of evil] like unto the share of their fellows [of old]: so let them not ask Me to hasten [their doom]!
Muhammad Asad.verse 51:76: For woe unto those who are bent on denying the truth –
Muhammad Asad.verse 51:77: on the Day which they have been promised!
Muhammad Asad.verse 51:78: is he who is made to lie” – or, according to the Tāj al-‘Arūs, “he who is perverted in his reason and opinion,” i.

Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 51:2: then those that bear load (of clouds),
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 51:3: then those that float with ease,
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 51:5: whatever you are being promised is surely true,
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 51:6: and Recompense (of deeds) is sure to happen.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 51:8: you are (involved) in a contradictory discussion.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 51:9: Turned away from this (Qur’ān) is the one who is turned away (totally from the truth.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 51:10: Death upon those who make conjectures (against the true faith),
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 51:11: - those who are drowned in ignorance, forgetful!
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 51:12: They ask, “When shall be the Day of Recompense?”
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 51:13: (It will be) the Day when they will be heated on the Fire,
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 51:14: (and it will be said to them,) “Taste (the punishment of) your mischief.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 51:15: The God-fearing (on the other hand) will be in gardens and springs,
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 51:16: receiving what their Lord will have given to them.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 51:17: They used to sleep little in the night;
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 51:18: and in the hours before dawn they used to pray for forgiveness,
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 51:19: and in their wealth, there was a right for one who asks and for one who is deprived.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 51:20: In the earth, there are signs for those who (seek truth to) believe,
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 51:21: and in your own selves! So, do you not perceive?
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 51:22: And in the heavens, there is your sustenance and all that you have been promised.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 51:23: So, by the Lord of the heavens and the earth, it (the Day of Recompense) is a reality, as sure as the fact that you (can) speak.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 51:24: Has there come to you the story of the honoured guests of Ibrāhīm?
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 51:25: When they (the angels in human form) entered unto him and said, “We greet you with Salām .
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 51:26: Then he slipped off to his home and fetched a fattened calf.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 51:27: So he presented it before them (to eat, but being angels, they refrained.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 51:28: So he felt some fear in his heart.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 51:29: So his wife came forward with a clamor, and slapped her own face and said, “(How can I have a child when I am) a barren old woman?”
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 51:30: They said, “This is how your Lord has said.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 51:31: He (Ibrāhīm) said (to the angels), “Then, what is your mission O messengers?”
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 51:32: They said, “We are sent to a guilty people, (i.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 51:33: so that we may send down upon them stones of clay,
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 51:34: marked by your Lord for the transgressors.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 51:35: So, We let the believers who were there to come out (from danger),
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 51:36: but We did not find in it any Muslims, except one house.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 51:37: And We left in this (event) a sign (of deterrence) for those who fear the painful punishment.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 51:38: And (We left a similar sign) in (the story of) Mūsā, when We sent him to Fir‘aun (Pharaoh) with a clear proof.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 51:39: So he turned away along with his chiefs and said, “ (Mūsā is) a magician or a madman!”
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 51:40: So We seized him and his army, and cast them into the sea, as he was of culpable behaviour.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 51:41: And (a similar sign was left) in (the story of) ‘Ād, when We sent upon them the wind that was barren (from any benefit);
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 51:42: it spared nothing it came upon, but rendered it like a stuff smashed by decay.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 51:43: And (a similar sign was left) in (the story of) Thamūd, when it was said to them, “Enjoy yourselves for a while.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 51:44: Then they rebelled against the command of your Lord; so the thunderbolt (of divine punishment) seized them, while they were looking on.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 51:45: Then they were neither able to stand (before the punishment), nor could they defend themselves.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 51:46: And (We have destroyed) the people of NūH even before; indeed they were a sinful people.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 51:47: And the sky was built by Us with might; and indeed We are the expanders.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 51:48: And the earth was spread out by Us as a floor; so how well have We spread it out!
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 51:49: And from every thing We have created pairs of twos, so that you may heed.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 51:51: And do not make up any other god along with Allah.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 51:52: In similar way, no messenger came to those before them, but they said, “(He is) a magician or a madman.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 51:53: Have they handed down (this saying) to each other as a legacy? Rather they are a rebellious people.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 51:54: So, turn away from them, for you are not blamed.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 51:55: And keep reminding, because reminding benefits the believers.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 51:56: I did not create the Jinns and the human beings except for the purpose that they should worship Me.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 51:57: I do not want any sustenance from them, nor do I want them to feed Me.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 51:58: In fact, Allah is the All-Sustainer, Possessor of power, the Strong.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 51:59: So, those who did wrong will have their turn like the turn of their counterparts.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 51:60: Woe, then, to those who disbelieve because of the Day of theirs that they are promised (for punishment).
